about_the_game:
Fear The Timeloop offers a fresh take on the survival horror genre, combining elements of horror with time loop storytelling.

Sheriff James Cooper wakes up in an abandoned hospital, forced to die every fifteen minutes. The only person he can communicate with is police dispatcher Rose, for whom time moves normally. With her help, he tries to escape the trap set by his arch-enemy.

Play the first two chapters of this adventure in the free demo of Fear The Timeloop.
detailed_description:
Fear The Timeloop offers a fresh take on the survival horror genre, combining elements of horror with time loop storytelling.

Sheriff James Cooper wakes up in an abandoned hospital, forced to die every fifteen minutes. The only person he can communicate with is police dispatcher Rose, for whom time moves normally. With her help, he tries to escape the trap set by his arch-enemy.

Play the first two chapters of this adventure in the free demo of Fear The Timeloop.
name: Fear The Timeloop: Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 570 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Expected performance (on "Minimum" mode): 1080p/30 frames per second.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 / NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Expected performance: 1080p/60 frames per second.

short_description: Fear The Timeloop is a survival horror game where every fifteen minutes, the protagonist dies and resets to the starting point. Can you break the cycle and escape the loop? Play through the first two chapters to experience it firsthand.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Ukrainian, Czech, Japanese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
